com.facebook.litho.animation

Class AnimatedComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.animation.AnimatedComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppearingComponent, ChangingComponent, DisappearingComponent

    public abstract class AnimatedComponent
extends Object
    Base class to reference a component that can be animated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedComponent

        public AnimatedComponent(String key)
        Parameters:
        key - the transitionKey for this component. This key is used to look up this component in the mounted hierarchy just before the animation.
